mapper.select: SELECT A.EMAIL , A.NICKNAME , A.PASSWORD , A.PHONE , A.IS_JANDI , A.WARNING , A.IS_BLACK , A.ENROLL_DATE , A.IS_EXIT , A.NAME FROM SSACK_TBL A WHERE A.EMAIL = #{ email } AND A.IS_EXIT = 'N'
SELECT A.PASSWORD FROM SSACK_TBL A WHERE A.EMAIL = #{ email } AND IS_EXIT = 'N'
SELECT * FROM REPORT_MEMBER_TBL A JOIN REPORT_STATEMENT_TBL B ON(A.REP_TYPE_CODE = B.REP_TYPE_CODE) WHERE A.REP_EMAIL = #{ email } AND A.REP_YN = 'Y'

SELECT R.REP_CODE , R.REP_DATE , R.CLASS_CODE , R.REP_YN , C.EMAIL , C.TITLE , S.REP_TYPE , M.WARNING FROM REPORT_CLASS_TBL R JOIN CLASS_TBL C ON(C.CLASS_CODE = R.CLASS_CODE) JOIN REPORT_STATEMENT_TBL S ON(S.REP_TYPE_CODE = R.REP_TYPE_CODE) JOIN SSACK_TBL M ON(M.EMAIL = C.EMAIL) WHERE C.EMAIL = #{ email } AND R.REP_YN = 'Y'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPORT_CLASS_TBL R JOIN CLASS_TBL C ON(C.CLASS_CODE = R.CLASS_CODE) JOIN REPORT_STATEMENT_TBL S ON(S.REP_TYPE_CODE = R.REP_TYPE_CODE) JOIN SSACK_TBL M ON(M.EMAIL = C.EMAIL) WHERE C.EMAIL = #{ email } AND R.REP_YN = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPORT_MEMBER_TBL A JOIN REPORT_STATEMENT_TBL B ON(A.REP_TYPE_CODE = B.REP_TYPE_CODE) WHERE A.REP_EMAIL = #{ email } AND A.REP_YN = 'Y'

SELECT V2.RNUM , V2.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , V.* FROM (SELECT A.END_DATE , A.PAY_CODE , B.TITLE , B.CLASS_CODE , C.CATEGORY_NAME , D.NICKNAME , E.PAY_DATE FROM PURCHASE_CLASS_TBL A JOIN CLASS_TBL B ON (A.CLASS_CODE = B.CLASS_CODE) JOIN CATEGORY_TBL C ON (B.CATEGORY_CODE = C.CATEGORY_CODE) JOIN JANDI_TBL D ON (B.EMAIL = D.EMAIL) JOIN PAYMENT_TBL E ON (A.PAY_CODE = E.PAY_CODE)
A.EMAIL = #{ email } AND A.STATUS = 'Y'
AND C.CATEGORY_NAME LIKE '%' || #{ selectCriteria.searchValue } || '%'
AND B.TITLE LIKE '%' || #{ selectCriteria.searchValue } || '%'
AND D.NICKNAME LIKE '%' || #{ selectCriteria.searchValue } || '%'
ORDER BY A.END_DATE DESC )V )V2 WHERE V2.RNUM BETWEEN #{ selectCriteria.startRow } AND #{ selectCriteria.endRow }

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PURCHASE_CLASS_TBL A JOIN CLASS_TBL B ON (A.CLASS_CODE = B.CLASS_CODE) JOIN CATEGORY_TBL C ON (B.CATEGORY_CODE = C.CATEGORY_CODE) JOIN JANDI_TBL D ON (B.EMAIL = D.EMAIL)
A.EMAIL = #{ email } AND A.STATUS = 'Y'
AND C.CATEGORY_NAME LIKE '%' || #{ searchValue } || '%'
AND B.TITLE LIKE '%' || #{ searchValue } || '%'
AND D.NICKNAME LIKE '%' || #{ searchValue } || '%'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PURCHASE_CLASS_TBL A LEFT JOIN CLASS_REVIEW_TBL T ON(A.CLASS_PURC_CODE = T.CLASS_PURC_CODE) JOIN CLASS_TBL L ON (L.CLASS_CODE = A.CLASS_CODE ) JOIN CATEGORY_TBL C ON (C.CATEGORY_CODE = L.CATEGORY_CODE) JOIN JANDI_TBL J ON (L.EMAIL = J.EMAIL ) JOIN PAYMENT_TBL E ON (A.PAY_CODE = E.PAY_CODE)
A.STATUS = 'N' AND A.EMAIL = #{ email }
AND C.CATEGORY_NAME LIKE '%' || #{ searchValue } || '%'
AND L.TITLE LIKE '%' || #{ searchValue } || '%'
AND J.NICKNAME LIKE '%' || #{ searchValue } || '%'

SELECT C.EMAIL , C.END_DATE , L.TITLE , P.PAY_DATE , J.NICKNAME , T.CATEGORY_NAME JOIN CLASS_TBL L ON (L.CLASS_CODE = C.CLASS_CODE ) JOIN PAYMENT_TBL E ON (C.PAY_CODE = E.PAY_CODE) JOIN JANDI_TBL J ON ( L.EMAIL = J.EMAIL ) JOIN CATEGORY_TBL T ON (T.CATEGORY_CODE = L.CATEGORY_CODE) WHERE C.EMAIL = #{ email }

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LIKED_CLASS_TBL A JOIN CLASS_TBL B ON (A.CLASS_CODE = B.CLASS_CODE) JOIN CATEGORY_TBL C ON (B.CATEGORY_CODE = C.CATEGORY_CODE) JOIN JANDI_TBL D ON (B.EMAIL = D.EMAIL)
A.EMAIL = #{ email }
AND C.CATEGORY_NAME LIKE '%' || #{ searchValue } || '%'
AND B.TITLE LIKE '%' || #{ searchValue } || '%'
AND D.NICKNAME LIKE '%' || #{ searchValue } || '%'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PURCHASE_CLASS_TBL A JOIN CLASS_TBL B ON (A.CLASS_CODE = B.CLASS_CODE) JOIN JANDI_TBL C ON (B.EMAIL = C.EMAIL)
A.EMAIL = #{ email }
AND B.TITLE LIKE '%' || #{ searchValue } || '%'
AND C.NICKNAME LIKE '%' || #{ searchValue } || '%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CLASS_REVIEW_TBL WHERE EMAIL = #{ email } AND IS_DELETED = 'N'
mapper.update: UPDATE CLASS_REVIEW_TBL SET IS_DELETED = NULL , REVIEW_CODE = NULL WHERE REVIEW_CODE = #{ rvCode }

UPDATE PURCHASE_CLASS_TBL A SET A.STATUS = 'N' WHERE A.PAY_CODE IN
#{ endClassList.payCode }
